welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ushiku, Japan! Known for its stunning Ushiku Daibutsu statue and beautiful cherry blossoms, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Narita International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary international terminal at Narita International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibaraki Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
